project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves the current weather information for a specified city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries for API calls
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Implement the function to parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Implement the function to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure correctness
